sentences.en: A slender skewer , usually ornamented at the top, used decoratively, especially in serving garnishes.
sentences.cn: 一种细长的叉状物, 通常顶部有点缀, 用作装饰, 尤其在食品装饰中.

sentences.en: Always plant stakes to skewer your own cavalry on.
sentences.cn: 放置木桩,然后就可以串烤你的骑兵了.

sentences.en: Doctors have removed a skewer from the head of a Russian woman.
sentences.cn: 医生从一名女子的头部取出一把烤肉叉.

sentences.en: Hypocricy . org - Very funny satire site designed to skewer our Rulers. Hypocricy.
sentences.cn: org - 非常有趣的讽刺网站旨在丳我们的统治者.

sentences.en: Redip the skewer and repeat in all samples.
sentences.cn: 每个样本都重复一样的动作.
烹饪前先把鸡肉串起来.

sentences.en: The cake is baked through when you insert a skewer and it remains clean.
sentences.cn: 用支竹签或是细筷子插入蛋糕中间,取出要是干净的就是烤好了.

sentences.en: The skewer for the bike is now going to go through the rack and wheel.
sentences.cn: 该串的自行车现在是去通过机架和车轮.

sentences.en: There are many people who sell pieces of roast mutton on a skewer by the roadside.
sentences.cn: 路边有很多卖烤羊肉串的人.

sentences.en: They are cooked when a skewer inserted into one and then removed comes out clean.
sentences.cn: 将一根筷子插入一块玛芬,拿出时如果是干爽的,即已经烤好.

sentences.en: To bind or skewer the wings or legs of a fowl before cooking.
sentences.cn: 浸泡过的肉串,在串肉扦上烹制,通常和蔬菜一起.

sentences.en: Try twisting a skewer through the sides of a balloon instead of the ends. What happens?
sentences.cn: 试著从侧面来刺入气球,而不是两端, 会发生什麽事 呢 ?

sentences.en: Use bamboo stick to skewer the prawns & grilled , then grilled vegetables & set aside.
sentences.cn: 用竹签将 明虾 串起来, 烤熟.蔬菜烤熟待用.

sentences.en: Yan Street West powder 1 small tin cars, appeared on time every night, hit a skewer.
sentences.cn: 艳粉街西的一间小铁皮车, 每天晚上准时出现, 出手烤串.

trans.tran_cn: 串肉杆，烤肉叉子，叉状物，针状物
trans.tran_en: a long metal or wooden stick that is put through pieces of meat to hold them together while they are cooked

trans.tran_cn: 用串肉扦串起来，刺穿，串住
